title: Curiosity magazine type
content:
Hi, can you please help me ID this font? I took this picture from the cover of Aperture magazine.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo copy 2.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818003516/http:/typophile.com/files/photo%20copy%202.JPG) | 53.15 KB |
author: robotrock

comments.content:
Hi Akira. Think you meant to post this in response to robotrock's other ID request.  
BTW I can't name "curiosity" offhand, but it looks awfully familiar.  
Don
Don, thanks a lot! I was going to post on the other thread, but posted on the wrong one.

And I believe the serif face was designed by A2-Type, too.  
 [http://www.a2-type.co.uk/html/commission.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818003516/http:/www.a2-type.co.uk/html/commission.html "http://www.a2-type.co.uk/html/commission.html")

You're welcome Akira.  
And "curiosity" is indeed answered.  
The A2-Type website provides an interesting mix of well designed retail fonts & commission work. This seems to be a good way for studio size font makers to operate.  
Don
